div.div: Relationship between T PREF and T MEAN for 93 bird species wintering in peninsular Spain.
div.p: The graph shows 93 species for which the 95%-quantile regression models including the linear and quadratic terms of temperature attained AIC figures that were 13.82 units lower than those AIC figures obtained for 95%-quantile null regression models. Solid line represents the linear regression between T PREF and T MEAN.
